Chassis.description: The Chassis schema represents the physical components of a system.  This resource represents the sheet-metal confined spaces and logical zones such as racks, enclosures, chassis and all other containers.  Subsystems, such as sensors, that operate outside of a system's data plane are linked either directly or indirectly through this resource.  A subsystem that operates outside of a system's data plane are not accessible to software that runs on the system.
Chassis.longDescription: This resource shall represent a chassis or other physical enclosure for a Redfish implementation.

title: #Chassis.Chassis
